body_html: These add an "integrated" build that packages PyTorch and Caffe2 together. Further work is needed to make the binaries point to the same CUDA libs and to the same ATen, but that work needs to go into cmake. These changes should only affect the Anaconda builds (which is why tests were cancelled).

body: These add an "integrated" build that packages PyTorch and Caffe2 together. Further work is needed to make the binaries point to the same CUDA libs and to the same ATen, but that work needs to go into cmake. These changes should only affect the Anaconda builds (which is why tests were cancelled).
